snippet: The cabaret singer Barbara Cook is performing “Let’s Fall in Love” at Feinstein’s at Loews Regency through Saturday.
abstract: Steven Holden reviews performance by cabaret singer Barbara Cook at Feinstein's at Loews Regency.
lead_paragraph: The cabaret singer Barbara Cook is performing “Let’s Fall in Love” at Feinstein’s at Loews Regency through Saturday.
